## SendableLiquity.redeemLUSD() method

Redeem LUSD to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redeemLUSD(amount: Decimalish, maxRedemptionRate?: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, RedemptionDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of LUSD to be redeemed. |
|  maxRedemptionRate | [Decimalish](./arth-lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./arth-lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./arth-lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./arth-lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [RedemptionDetails](./arth-lib-base.redemptiondetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
